comment: I love that these remixes are ACTUAL remixes, and not just added verses. We got a totally new album and I'm here for it!
This song isn't only iconic, it's very relatable too. Some people just be saying things, acting sympathic and all but they truly only want the worst for you.
The vocal layering and adlibs of ariana is fucking insane, takes the song to different level. Like just listen to the adlib of "on top" at 1:32. Just perfection

AG and easy fun are seriously the OG COOKs. Period. The vocal layers and that high note arpeggio is such a unique and ethereal melody structure. Aris voice worked well with the robotic auto tune effect. So many gems to this piece love it
Ariana producing amazing vocals as always I literally have goosebumps @ 1:35
ariana's background vocals and adlibs are the best things in the world!!
Why would they remove that gorgeous chorus? I was looking forward to Ariana singing that part but I still love it
the ariana's verse remind me so bad her unreleased song "oh darlin", I love itt

Sprained my finger clicking on this so fast. Was not disappointed. This is what remixes are supposed to be. Adding to the creativity of the original not just slipping in one extra verse before the bridge. Like it or hate it, this [Charlie's entire brat era] is artistic expression at its finest.
"It's a knife when you know they're counting on you mistakes" these lyrics is so relatable to my life at school cuz my " friend" backstabbed me
